Detailed Description

Manager of all scene setting save filter classes.

There is only one instance of this manager in an application. This instance is created and owned by DzApp. Don't create an instance of this class, but rather request a pointer to it from DzApp via DzApp::getSaveFilterMgr().

Member Function Documentation

void DzAssetIOMgr::addClass ( DzClassFactory *  type  )  [static, protected]

Adds the given class type (which must be an DzAssetIOFilter-derived or DzAssetExtraObjectIO-derived type) to the list of asset I/O filter class types.

Parameters:
type A pointer to the factory to add to the list.
DzAssetExtraObjectIOPtr DzAssetIOMgr::createExtraObjectIO ( const QMetaObject *  meta,
QString &  tag 
) [static]
Parameters:
QMetaObject of the objec to write
tag This string will be set to the type tag for the object if the function returns non-NULL
Returns:
DzAssetExtraObjectIO to reader to write the given type. The callee is responsible for deleting the object after write is finished. This may return null if object has not been registered with the DzAssetIOMgr.

DzError DzAssetIOMgr::loadMorphDeltas ( DzMorphDeltas *  deltas  ) 

Loads morph deltas from a DAZ Studio asset file.

Parameters:
deltas The deltas to load the values for. The storable URI of the deltas must already be set to the asset URI of the morph that the deltas will be loaded from.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR if the file load was successful.

QMetaObject const *  ioMeta,
QMetaObject const *  classMeta 
) [static]
Parameters:
